metadata.title: CVE-2019-9821 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability can occur in AssertWorkerThread due to a race condition with shared workers. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 67.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9821` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '67.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
